AboutDescription.summary:
Working with web development since 2019, I developed apps using Ionic with Angular and an e-commerce website, which has thounsands of users per month.
I'm currently working on a PBX project and maintaining the e-commerce I developed.
I'm always looking to improve my skills and coding, and up for new challenges.
AboutDescription.DBM1: I worked as the lead front-end developer to create a new PBX system.
AboutDescription.DBM2: Front-end technologies used: Angular with Bootstrap.
AboutDescription.Esal1: Developed the Esalcorp app, which is used to manage the company’s internal inventory, using Ionic framework with Angular.
AboutDescription.Esal2: Developed Esalflores e-commerce website, which connects with the company’s ERP api. The website reaches thousands of users per month.
AboutDescription.Korp1: I developed and ensured maintenance of the ERP system, SQL queries and Unit Tests.
AboutDescription.Korp2: As an intern, my main task was to build SQL queries and guarantee the good functionality of the program.
AboutDescription.RPC1: RPC is a television network, being the largest affiliate of Rede Globo, covering the entire state of Paraná.
AboutDescription.RPC2: My main responsibility is to develop new applications and ensure the stability of the company's systems, performing serverless deployments and creating Lambda functions on AWS.
AboutDescription.Reali1: Acting as a software developer to create modules in Odoo, for integration with the company's customers.
